summary.title: Professional Summary
paragraphs: Senior Data Engineer (7+ years) specializing in the architecture of production-grade data platforms and ELT/ETL frameworks. I transform fragmented source data into governed, analytics-ready assets with a focus on performance, cost-efficiency, and high data trust.

• Architecture & Performance: Delivered a Snowflake subject area using dimensional modeling and 200+ dbt models (tests/macros/docs), driving ~3× query performance and ~42% faster analyst time-to-insight.

• Pipeline Engineering: Built and tuned ingestion + transformation in Python/SQL/dbt with Airflow orchestration (reusable connectors, incremental patterns), cutting batch latency ~45% while keeping pipelines maintainable and auditable.

• Reliability & FinOps: Operationalized data observability using Great Expectations and Monte Carlo, maintaining 99.9% availability. Reduced incident MTTR by ~35% and slashed compute costs by ~20% through proactive warehouse tuning and SQL optimization.
• AI for Analytics: Leveraged prompt design and LLM orchestration to streamline internal analytics workflows, implementing robust evaluation frameworks and guardrails to ensure output reliability.

research_interests.title: Data Engineering Skill Set
items: Core Data Engineering: Python, SQL; ELT/ETL pipelines, reusable ingestion patterns, incremental loads, backfills, auditability.
Modeling & Analytics: Dimensional modeling (Star/Snowflake schema), curated marts, governed metrics, semantic layers.
Orchestration & Transformation: Airflow, dbt (models/macros/tests/docs), DAG scheduling, dependency management, reliability patterns.
Streaming & Distributed Compute: Kafka, Spark, PySpark (Batch + Streaming fundamentals).
Cloud & Warehousing: Snowflake; AWS (S3, Glue, Lambda, ECS/Fargate, Redshift); BigQuery; Databricks/Delta Lake.
Quality & Observability: Great Expectations, Monte Carlo; SLAs, lineage, monitoring, incident runbooks.
BI & Semantics: Looker (LookML/Explores), Power BI, Tableau; KPI design and governance.
Dev & Automation: Git, CI/CD, Docker, Terraform; testing, code review, repeatable deployments.
AI Engineering: Prompt design, RAG fundamentals (LangChain/LangGraph), Vector Databases (pgvector/Milvus), LLM evaluation.

items.title: VideoSemanticAlignment: Multimodal Fine-Tuning Pipeline & Research- Manuscript in Peer Review (Peer Review)
items.description: Lead Data Architect for a vision-language research project. Engineered a high-throughput preprocessing workflow that cleans event-level text and aligns it to specific video temporal segments. Built the underlying data infrastructure to generate high-fidelity supervised pairs for multimodal fine-tuning, directly enabling state-of-the-art narrative-to-visual mapping.
items.tech_stack: Python, Vision–Language Models (VLM), PyTorch, Temporal Data Alignment, Dataset Distillation.

items.title: Secure PII Event Ingestion Framework (SQS → Postgres)
items.description: Built a decoupled pipeline using AWS SQS (via LocalStack) and Python. Implemented SHA-256 pseudonymization for PII fields during the ingestion flight.

items.title: LLM Integration Gateway & Context Orchestrator (Deployed on Current Page)
items.description: Engineered a containerized FastAPI backend to bridge public frontend interfaces with OpenAI’s orchestration layer. Designed a decoupled architecture to secure API credentials and implement custom context-injection, ensuring responses are grounded in curated datasets while enforcing strict Pydantic schema validation and CORS security.
items.tech_stack: Python, FastAPI, Uvicorn, Pydantic, OpenAI SDK, Render, Docker.

items.title: ASTRA-X Overthinker: Agentic Workflow Orchestrator
items.description: Created a workflow engine that automates scheduled iterations and persists goal states. It generates timestamped progress logs and human-readable changelogs for reproducibility.
